title: 'Zelenskyy ought to say thank you to American taxpayers': JD Vance on Russia-Ukraine war
content: JD Vance, Republican vice presidential nominee, asserted that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy should be grateful to American taxpayers for their financial support. He criticized Zelenskyy's demands and stated that a Trump-Vance administration would end the Ukraine war through strong leadership. The US has provided extensive aid to Ukraine, while denying requests for long-range missiles.
summary: JD Vance, Republican vice presidential nominee, asserted that Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy should be grateful to American taxpayers for their financial support. He criticized Zelenskyy's demands and stated that a Trump-Vance administration would end the Ukraine war through strong leadership. The US has provided extensive aid to Ukraine, while denying requests for long-range missiles.

title: 'Miracles': How Melania reacted to husband Trump's assassination attempts
content: In her first TV appearance in over two years, Melania Trump recounted learning about two assassination attempts on Donald Trump's life. She praised the Secret Service's response and called for more answers regarding these incidents. This comes ahead of her memoir release and a task force hearing on security failures.
summary: In her first TV appearance in over two years, Melania Trump recounted learning about two assassination attempts on Donald Trump's life. She praised the Secret Service's response and called for more answers regarding these incidents. This comes ahead of her memoir release and a task force hearing on security failures.

title: Who is Eric Adams? First sitting NYC mayor to face criminal charges
content: New York City Mayor Eric Adams, who was elected nearly three years ago with promises of reducing crime and enhancing public safety, is now facing an indictment as part of a federal corruption investigation. This unprecedented event makes Adams the first sitting NYC mayor to face criminal charges, casting uncertainty over his administration.
summary: New York City Mayor Eric Adams, who was elected nearly three years ago with promises of reducing crime and enhancing public safety, is now facing an indictment as part of a federal corruption investigation. This unprecedented event makes Adams the first sitting NYC mayor to face criminal charges, casting uncertainty over his administration.

title: Bangladesh revolution sparks new hopes among Rohingya
content: The ousting of Bangladesh's ex-premier Sheikh Hasina has sparked hope among Rohingya refugees in Cox's Bazar. Under her rule, the camps suffered from malnutrition and violence. Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus, now heading an interim government, vows continued support and is lobbying for more international aid to address their plight.
summary: The ousting of Bangladesh's ex-premier Sheikh Hasina has sparked hope among Rohingya refugees in Cox's Bazar. Under her rule, the camps suffered from malnutrition and violence. Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus, now heading an interim government, vows continued support and is lobbying for more international aid to address their plight.

title: Image shows UFO taken down by US jet in Canada following Chinese spy craft incident: Report
content: A photograph of a UFO shot down by a US fighter jet over Canadian airspace in February 2023 has been made public. The image depicts a blurry cylindrical object hovering before being brought down in Canada's Yukon Territory. This event occurred shortly after the downing of a Chinese surveillance balloon and involved an AIM 9X missile.
summary: A photograph of a UFO shot down by a US fighter jet over Canadian airspace in February 2023 has been made public. The image depicts a blurry cylindrical object hovering before being brought down in Canada's Yukon Territory. This event occurred shortly after the downing of a Chinese surveillance balloon and involved an AIM 9X missile.

title: Where are donations for Trump’s campaign going? It’s this mystery firm
content: Donald Trump’s election fundraising campaign has provided $15 million to Launchpad Strategies, yet the purpose remains unclear. Over nine years, $876 million has flowed through Trump’s campaigns to six companies, including Launchpad Strategies. Despite meeting disclosure requirements, the identities of strategists and ultimate fund recipients are unknown, raising transparency issues.
summary: Donald Trump’s election fundraising campaign has provided $15 million to Launchpad Strategies, yet the purpose remains unclear. Over nine years, $876 million has flowed through Trump’s campaigns to six companies, including Launchpad Strategies. Despite meeting disclosure requirements, the identities of strategists and ultimate fund recipients are unknown, raising transparency issues.

title: In a first, elderly couple in UK seek double 'suicide pod' to end lives
content: Elderly couple Christine and Peter Scott have signed up with a Swiss-based assisted suicide group to use the Sarco machine due to concerns over timely NHS treatment. Christine suffers from vascular dementia. Their decision has sparked debates on the ethics of assisted suicide and the state of healthcare.
summary: Elderly couple Christine and Peter Scott have signed up with a Swiss-based assisted suicide group to use the Sarco machine due to concerns over timely NHS treatment. Christine suffers from vascular dementia. Their decision has sparked debates on the ethics of assisted suicide and the state of healthcare.

title: Chinese Americans face racism, mental health risks amid tensions
content: A recent survey indicates that 68% of Chinese Americans experience monthly discrimination, largely due to racial bias. The study underscores significant mental health challenges within the community, particularly among youth and women. It also highlights concerns over political rhetoric and media portrayal affecting how they are treated by others. Respondents were presented with 49 questions covering wide topics.
summary: A recent survey indicates that 68% of Chinese Americans experience monthly discrimination, largely due to racial bias. The study underscores significant mental health challenges within the community, particularly among youth and women. It also highlights concerns over political rhetoric and media portrayal affecting how they are treated by others.  Respondents were presented with 49 questions covering wide topics.

title: 'Loud bang': Explosive at California courthouse leaves at least 5 injured, suspect held
content: A 20-year-old man caused an explosion at the Santa Maria Courthouse in California, injuring five people. He was arrested while trying to flee and found wearing body armor. Authorities ruled out terrorism and are investigating possible links to arson cases. The courthouse remains closed for further investigation.
summary: A 20-year-old man caused an explosion at the Santa Maria Courthouse in California, injuring five people. He was arrested while trying to flee and found wearing body armor. Authorities ruled out terrorism and are investigating possible links to arson cases. The courthouse remains closed for further investigation.

title: Secret Service denies 'security lapse' around Obama, labels TMZ report 'inaccurate'
content: The US Secret Service has refuted claims of a security lapse during former President Barack Obama's visit to Los Angeles. A security guard alleged he approached Obama's SUV without interference, but the agency clarified Obama was not in the vehicle at that time. The Secret Service insists that their protective measures were intact.
summary: The US Secret Service has refuted claims of a security lapse during former President Barack Obama's visit to Los Angeles. A security guard alleged he approached Obama's SUV without interference, but the agency clarified Obama was not in the vehicle at that time. The Secret Service insists that their protective measures were intact.

title: Trump urges Apple to decrypt phones of accused assassins, aid FBI probe
content: Donald Trump has urged Apple to aid the FBI in decrypting phones linked to assassination plots against him. The FBI is struggling to access certain apps and devices related to the investigation. Trump also criticized President Biden for not addressing threats from Iran, suggesting a strong retaliatory stance if he were president.
summary: Donald Trump has urged Apple to aid the FBI in decrypting phones linked to assassination plots against him. The FBI is struggling to access certain apps and devices related to the investigation. Trump also criticized President Biden for not addressing threats from Iran, suggesting a strong retaliatory stance if he were president.

title: Taiwan detects 43 Chinese military aircraft, 8 navy ships around island
content: Taiwan's defence ministry reports increased Chinese military activity, detecting 43 warplanes and eight naval vessels in a day. Aircraft flew off Taiwan's coasts, with some crossing the median line of the Taiwan Strait. These actions are part of China's annual drills simulating attacks to prevent foreign intervention during potential conflicts.
summary: Taiwan's defence ministry reports increased Chinese military activity, detecting 43 warplanes and eight naval vessels in a day. Aircraft flew off Taiwan's coasts, with some crossing the median line of the Taiwan Strait. These actions are part of China's annual drills simulating attacks to prevent foreign intervention during potential conflicts.

title: Russia has secret war drones project in China to bolster Ukraine war efforts: Report
content: Russia has set up a weapons programme in China to create long-range attack drones for the Ukraine war. A subsidiary of Russian state-owned arms company Almaz-Antey developed the Garpiya-3 drone with Chinese help. The White House and Britain's Foreign Office are concerned about China's potential role in supporting Russia's military actions.
summary: Russia has set up a weapons programme in China to create long-range attack drones for the Ukraine war. A subsidiary of Russian state-owned arms company Almaz-Antey developed the Garpiya-3 drone with Chinese help. The White House and Britain's Foreign Office are concerned about China's potential role in supporting Russia's military actions.

title: 'Welcome to Washington': Biden's latest blunder in New York while addressing world leaders — watch
content: President Joe Biden made an error by welcoming world leaders to Washington at an event in New York. This mistake is part of a series of recent gaffes, raising concerns about his mental fitness and leading to calls for his resignation from both Republicans and some Democrats.
summary: President Joe Biden made an error by welcoming world leaders to Washington at an event in New York. This mistake is part of a series of recent gaffes, raising concerns about his mental fitness and leading to calls for his resignation from both Republicans and some Democrats.

title: Biden offers continued American support as Dhaka implements new reform agenda
content: US President Joe Biden expressed ongoing support for Bangladesh's new reform agenda in a rare one-on-one meeting with chief adviser Muhammad Yunus at the UNGA in New York. Yunus highlighted student sacrifices against the previous government and emphasized the need for US cooperation to rebuild Bangladesh, making it a historic encounter.
summary: US President Joe Biden expressed ongoing support for Bangladesh's new reform agenda in a rare one-on-one meeting with chief adviser Muhammad Yunus at the UNGA in New York. Yunus highlighted student sacrifices against the previous government and emphasized the need for US cooperation to rebuild Bangladesh, making it a historic encounter.

title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams indicted in federal corruption probe: Report
content: New York City Mayor Eric L Adams has been indicted in a federal corruption investigation. The sealed charges are likely to affect the city's political dynamics ahead of an upcoming mayoral primary. Adams insists on his innocence and pledges to fight the allegations, as calls for his resignation intensify.
summary: New York City Mayor Eric L Adams has been indicted in a federal corruption investigation. The sealed charges are likely to affect the city's political dynamics ahead of an upcoming mayoral primary. Adams insists on his innocence and pledges to fight the allegations, as calls for his resignation intensify.

title: 'Hindus go back': BAPS temple vandalised in US; 2nd incident in month
content: The BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir in Sacramento, California was vandalized with anti-Hindu messages, echoing a recent incident in New York. The Hindu American Foundation and local officials condemned the act, noting an increase in anti-Hindu hate crimes. Authorities are urged to promote safety and respect for all faiths within the community.
summary: The BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir in Sacramento, California was vandalized with anti-Hindu messages, echoing a recent incident in New York. The Hindu American Foundation and local officials condemned the act, noting an increase in anti-Hindu hate crimes. Authorities are urged to promote safety and respect for all faiths within the community.

title: PIO Sandhya Suri's thriller 'Santosh', shot in UP, named UK's Oscar entry
US Secret Service agent under lens over 'sexual misconduct' involving Kamala Harris staffer
content: The US Secret Service is investigating an agent following an incident with Kamala Harris' staff. The agent is on administrative leave amid allegations of misconduct in a Wisconsin hotel room during a trip to scout campaign stops. The alleged incident led to the cancellation of the planned Harris event.
summary: The US Secret Service is investigating an agent following an incident with Kamala Harris' staff. The agent is on administrative leave amid allegations of misconduct in a Wisconsin hotel room during a trip to scout campaign stops. The alleged incident led to the cancellation of the planned Harris event.

title: Passenger killed when gunman hijacks city bus, leads police on chase through downtown Los Angeles
content: In Los Angeles, a gunman hijacked a city bus, leading to a slow police chase that ended with the suspect's arrest. One passenger was killed, while the driver and another passenger were treated at the scene. Authorities are looking into ways to enhance safety on public transportation systems.
summary: In Los Angeles, a gunman hijacked a city bus, leading to a slow police chase that ended with the suspect's arrest. One passenger was killed, while the driver and another passenger were treated at the scene. Authorities are looking into ways to enhance safety on public transportation systems.
